name: Pepper.pk
tag_list: blackberry-apps, android-apps, iphone--apps, ipod-apps, iphone-games, ipod-games, smartphone-software, mobile-apps
overview:
Cutting edge mobile software products company that develops Mobile applications and games for the smart phones including iPhone, BlackBerries, Android, Windows Mobile and other smart phones as well. The apps they develop are easy to use and are very useful.

Pepper.pk has developed 3 World #1 Applications, including the best selling Photo Editor, originally for the BlackBerry, but now ported to Windows Phone 7 and the PlayBook as well. Overall, the company now fields a portfolio of over 150 applications as of 10/2011.

Pepper.pk has a team of seasoned developers developging BlackBerry value applications and tools. Their portfolio ranges from comprehensive utilities like BerrySnooper that is a lost/stolen phone tracking tool as well as simple but useful utilities like LED Notifier (that customizes your phone’s LED color). Pepper also develop Android apps and games and they have several apps and games available in Android Market.

Pepper.pk has released several utilities and games for iPhones and iPods ranging from puzzle games to useful utilities like sophisticated stop watches.

Pepper believes in creating value applications for all important mobile platforms and are working on several other platforms including Windows Mobile, J2ME and Nokia devices both with or without Symbian OS.

Pepper has partnerships and agreements with market leaders like RIM, Apple, OVI, Google, Handango and many more for developing, testing and selling their quality products to the customers and clients.
